statements: SELECT * FROM ClientInformation
SELECT client_name, client_address, client_age FROM ClientInformation
SELECT client_name, client_address, policy_type FROM ClientInformation WHERE client_age > 30
SELECT client_name, client_address, policy_type FROM ClientInformation WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance'
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM ClientInformation WHERE client_age < 25 ORDER BY client_name ASC
SELECT client_name, client_age, client_address FROM ClientInformation WHERE client_age > 40
SELECT * FROM ClientInformation WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance'
SELECT client_name FROM ClientInformation WHERE client_age < 30 ORDER BY client_name ASC
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_age FROM ClientInformation WHERE client_age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY client_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(client_id) AS total_clients FROM ClientInformation
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM clients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, email FROM clients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, coverage_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policies ORDER BY policy_end_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(policy_id) AS policy_count FROM policies GROUP BY client_id HAVING COUNT(policy_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM clients JOIN policies ON clients.client_id = policies.client_id WHERE policy_end_date >= '2022-01-01' AND premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name FROM clients WHERE dob < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, email FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' AND client_id NOT IN (SELECT client_id FROM policies);

SELECT client_id, coverage_type, premium_amount FROM policies JOIN clients ON policies.client_id = clients.client_id WHERE premium_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY coverage_type ASC, premium_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY policy_start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM clients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, first_name, date_of_birth FROM clients WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_amount > 1000 ORDER BY policy_amount DESC;
SELECT agent_name, commission_rate FROM agents WHERE commission_rate >= 0.1;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date_of_birth FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;

SELECT p.policy_id, p.policy_type, p.policy_amount, c.first_name AS client_first_name, c.last_name AS client_last_name, c.date_of_birth FROM policies p JOIN clients c ON p.client_id = c.client_id WHERE p.policy_amount > 1000;
SELECT a.agent_id, a.agent_name, a.agency_name, CONCAT('Commission Rate: ', a.commission_rate) AS commission_information FROM agents a;
SELECT c.client_id, CONCAT(c.first_name, ' ', c.last_name) AS full_name, COUNT(p.policy_id) AS policy_count FROM clients c LEFT JOIN policies p ON c.client_id = p.client_id GROUP BY c.client_id;
SELECT * FROM clients
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients
SELECT client_name, phone FROM clients WHERE client_id = 5
SELECT * FROM policies ORDER BY effective_date DESC
SELECT * FROM applications WHERE agent_id = 10
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE effective_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT agent_name, email FROM agents WHERE phone = '123-456-7890';

SELECT c.client_name, p.policy_number, a.agent_name FROM clients c JOIN applications app ON c.client_id = app.client_id JOIN policies p ON app.policy_id = p.policy_id JOIN agents a ON app.agent_id = a.agent_id WHERE app.application_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ClientInformation;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM ClientInformation WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Policy WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, start_date, end_date FROM Policy ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT agent_name, location FROM Agent;
SELECT * FROM ClientInformation ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM ClientInformation WHERE date_of_birth < '1980-01-01';
SELECT p.policy_id, p.policy_number, pt.type_name, pd.coverage FROM Policy AS p JOIN PolicyType AS pt ON p.policy_id = pt.type_id JOIN PolicyDetails AS pd ON p.policy_id = pd.policy_id;
SELECT a.agent_id, a.agent_name, p.policy_number FROM Agent AS a LEFT JOIN Policy AS p ON a.agent_id = p.client_id;
SELECT * FROM Policy WHERE end_date > start_date ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
